word: A Change of Heart Versus Suicide. Consider these words: "And I saw the dead, small and great, stand before God; and the books were opened; and another book was opened: . . . and the dead were judged out of those things which were written in the books, according to their works." "And whosoever was not found written in the book of life was cast into the lake of fire." [Revelation 20:12, 15.]
